history.proof: intros pl. induction pl using prec_list_ind. - simpl. sfirstorder depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment a : ad pl1, pl2 : prec_list IHpl1 : 1 <= pl_card pl1 IHpl2 : 1 <= pl_card pl2 Unable to unify "(?M1855 <= 1 -> ?M1855 = 0 \\/ ?M1855 = 1) /\\ (?M1855 = 0 \\/ ?M1855 = 1 -> ?M1855 <= 1)" with "1 <= S (pl_card pl1 + pl_card pl2)".

original: intros pl. induction pl using prec_list_ind. - simpl. apply Nat.le_1_r. auto. - simpl. lia.
